entry.value: MERGE (T:Task {Issue_Id: "${'Issue Id'}"}) SET T.Issue_Id = "${'Issue Id'}" SET T.Assignee_email = "${Assignee_email}" SET T.Reporter_email = "${Reporter_email}" SET T.Creation_Date = "${'Creation Date'}" SET T.Close_Date = coalesce("${'Close Date'}", "open") SET T.Estimated_Time = toInteger("${'Estimated Time'}") SET T.Actual_Time = toInteger("${'Actual Time'}")

entry.key: Pool - Num Tests Per Eviction Run

value.name: Pool - Num Tests Per Eviction Run

entry.key: Pool - Num Tests Per Eviction Run

entry.value: MATCH (E:Employee), (T:Task) WHERE E.Assignee_email = T.Reporter_email MERGE (E)-[r: create_task ]->(T)
MATCH (T:Task), (E:Employee) WHERE T.Assignee_email = E.Assignee_email MERGE (T)-[r: assigned_to ]->(E)
SELECT Assignee_email,count(*) total_tasks FROM FLOWFILE GROUP BY Assignee_email
